post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Oracle Database Administrator
About the Job
Oracle DBA needed for an immediate contract position. You will be the DB designer for a Custom client-server wireless application. This role is to start the 2nd week of April - so if you have to give 2 weeks notice - this will not be the role for you. 2 Month contract to start with multiple extensions depending on performance. Our client is a well known Consulting firm. Work will be performed at their end client located in downtown Toronto.
Must Have Skills:
Oracle 10g
Oracle DB Designer
Experience with DB driven client-server applications
post.title: Oracle Database Administrator
